messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] champagne moment...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tracy-- I m Karen from Ind., and I have some very young kids, too.  I enjoyed reading your posts, and I was curious as to where you live in the U.K., if you
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tracy-- I'm Karen from Ind., and I have some very young kids, too. I
enjoyed reading your posts, and I was curious as to where you live in the
U.K., if you don't mind sharing. Your posts catch my attention, as I can
easily visualize you and your family while reading them. Thanks for sharing
so many happy thoughts! Karen

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] champagne moment...
messages.msgSnippet: Stephanie, here I am asking you another question about abb. words:  is LLL Le Leche League?   Thanks for defining EBAY!  I had never heard of it.  I checked
messages.messageBody:
Stephanie, here I am asking you another question about abb. words: is LLL Le
Leche League? Thanks for defining EBAY! I had never heard of it. I
checked into the all advantage site, and joined yesterday-- yeah! now I can
earn as I play on the computer! :D My thanks to you and Heather, too!
Karen
